Name: Webber Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of red apple fan.
Review: This blackcurrant fruity cocktail has a citrus zing courtesy of the citrus vodka base and the addition of fresh lime juice, the sourness of which adds balance.
History: Created in September 2011 by Jack Webber for the British Brown's Bar & Restaurant chain, it’s since become a favourite on the Brown’s menu where it’s listed under ‘Browns Signature Cocktails’.
Nutrition: One serving of Webber Cocktail contains 190 calories
